text: Pogonocherus plasoni is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Ganglbauer in 1884. It is known from Greece and Croatia.BioLib.cz - Pogonocherus plasoni. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Pogonocherini Category:Beetles described in 1884
title: Pogonocherus plasoni
